column5: Got a chance last Saturday to get out with my kids fishing. We went to The Rapids and had a great morning fishing till the rain came! Cole my three year old, lipped his first fish!!! I was proud! Hopefully heading out again this weekend! Weather is supposed to be great! Here is a pic of the little guy. Looks like a pro!

hey way to go lil guy and its the worlds greatest sport fish too! i cant wait till my lil guy lips his first fish  know bbr will be grinin ear to ear congrats you look like your bringing up a fine lil angler!
Nice picture.
Dude's already got the Rapala hat and the pro shades. Gotta get him a new rod sponsor before he hits the tour though.  JF
Great pic. Rockbass truly are "The Worlds Greatest Sportfish". Soon he'll be lip gripping big smallies.
That is a great shot !!!!  Love to see the kids happy AND fishing.  THX for sharin
thanks all! he will be moving out of the tigger rod this weekend i hope! lol
And the camera savvy - hold the fish closer to the camera so it looks bigger. You sure Bob Izumi isn't his dad?
certainly not! lol going to head out again today!
What a cutie of a little dude!  Frame that one Bud.
Very cool.
Nice !!!!!!!  Do it as often as possible !!!!!  They grow up SOOOOO  Fast.  My "little guy" is 5'10" & driving the boat
went out again today. same place not as good luck as last time, but hte weather was awesome!! Caught some huge sunfish!!
Awesome picture!!! All that's missing is the thumbs up on his other hand!  It's all about the kids sometimes...no better feeling.
Great to see you having fun Richard
what an aewsome pic, get that one framed!!!  cheers!
Beautiful, definitely deserving of framing. I'm thinking 10 x 16.
too cute man--kindly consider allowing us to use this pic for our MNR/OFAH/National Sportmens Show --Take A Kid Fishing Poster-Pefferlaw  Thanks  Cheers  Paul  www.familyfishingweekend.com
Yep he sure got the look High five to him for lipping that brute Leechman
Awesome shot !!  Get him at least a blue rod will ya
i still don't trust him with anything that doesn't float lol We'll be out again this weekend for sure!
